post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 Maple Leaf College of Business and Technology/1326

주소 Canada Ontario  
  245 Fairview Mall Drive, suite 204 North York M2J 4T1

홈페이지 www.mapleleafcollege.ca

회사소개 Providing professional training in computer, IT, Business administration, Engineering and Languages


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 Web Site Maintenance

고용형태 Permanent, Part Time  

모집기간  Start Date: 2003/01/31

급여 To be negotiated

근무지 Canada   Ontario Toronto Centre  


지원자격
학력 Completion of university  

자격증 Associate Computing Professional (ACP)

경력 3 - 5 years

필요한기술 Computer hardware or software retailer, Computer manufacturing company, Industry, Government, Educational Institution, Research institution, Telecommunications equipment and networks manufacturing company, Consulting firm, Instrumentation and control products manufacturing company, Computer systems unit, Internet Service Provider, Software developer.

기타 Operating Systems: X-Windows
Hardware Environment: IBM PC and compatibles
Applications: Flash
Management Systems (erp or db): MS SQL Server, MySQL
Communication Protocols: HTTP



지원방법
지원방법 In Person / By E-mail  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 - -

post.title: Web Site Maintenance
